item.title: jane主题中安装百度统计
item.author: 273412935@qq.com (龙哥)
item.description: 获取百度统计代码 登陆百度统计/管理/自有网站/获取代码, 得到形如 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 <script> var _hmt = _hmt || []; (function() { var hm = document.createElement("script"); hm.src = "https://hm.baidu.com/hm.js?9dd8aaaaaaaaaaa7a8bde80b13fe8eaf"; var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(hm, s); })(); </script> 我们要的就
